Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Bravado
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
An Rimerican muscle car in a class by itself. Winner of multiple industry awards including 'Most Powerful in Class', 'Worst Handling' and 'Biggest Fireball', the Bravado brings the effortless cool of a time gone-by, to a generation born decades too late. Time to gun the engine, stare directly into a moody sunset, and live forever under a roadside grave in the middle of nowhere. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Passenger x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
